How easily and safely a bear could pick us up as we lie asleep! Only wolves and tigers seem to have learned to hunt man for food, and perhaps sharks and crocodiles.
author: John Muir

quote: These are the things of which men think, who live: of their own selves and the dwelling place of their fathers; of their neighbors; of work and service; of rule and reason and women and children; of Beauty and Death and War.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: Of all the men that have run for president in the twentieth century, only George McGovern truly understood what a monument America could be to the human race.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Why do Jewish men die before their wives? They want to.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: Men don't care what's on TV. They only care what else is on TV.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Whether women are better than men I cannot say - but I can say they are certainly no worse.
author: Golda Meir

quote: We should weep for men at their birth, not at their death.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: The men that is now is only all palaver and what they can get out of you.
author: James Joyce

quote: There is no such thing as justice in the abstract; it is merely a compact between men.
author: Epicurus

quote: Property is unstable, and youth perishes in a moment. Life itself is held in the grinning fangs of Death, Yet men delay to obtain release from the world. Alas, the conduct of mankind is surprising.
author: Plautus

quote: It is to such men as Abraham Lincoln and Jefferson and Jackson and Franklin, all most lowly born, that we owe most of our greatness as a nation.
author: Joseph Pulitzer

quote: It is better for a woman to compete impersonally in society, as men do, than to compete for dominance in her own home with her husband, compete with her neighbors for empty status, and so smother her son that he cannot compete at all.
author: Betty Friedan

quote: If you have men who will only come if they know there is a good road, I don't want them. I want men who will come if there is no road at all.
author: David Livingstone

quote: Men of New England, I hold you to the doctrines of liberty which ye inherit from your Puritan forefathers.
author: Caleb Cushing

quote: Men, in fact, are excited and looking forward to settling down and having families and being true partners with women in relationships that are full of excitement, unpredictability, adventure, and loyalty.
author: Ian K. Smith

quote: The first rule of business is: Do other men for they would do you.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: That men do not learn very much from the lessons of history is the most important of all the lessons of history.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I usually make up my mind about a man in ten seconds, and I very rarely change it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Classical quotation is the parole of literary men all over the world.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Sufficient for me is that honour which is not seen of men but is felt in the heart, as faithful is He who hath promised and who never lies.
author: Saint Patrick

quote: It will always be considered a praiseworthy undertaking to urge the most obstinate and incredulous to abide by the principles that impel men to live in society. There are, therefore, three distinct classes of vice and virtue: the religious, the natural, and the political. These three classes should never be in contradiction with one another.
author: Cesare Beccaria

quote: Necessity has been a priceless spur which has helped men to perform miracles against incredible odds.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: When lovely woman stoops to folly, and finds too late that men betray, what charm can soothe her melancholy, what art can wash her guilt away?
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: A woman simply is, but a man must become.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: Manhood coerced into sensitivity is no manhood at all.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: The story of the Alamo has touched many more people than one would think. So, I would like to pay my respects to those men on both sides of the walls in those months of February and March 1836.
author: Phil Collins

quote: Healing and miracles have been a mystery to men of all times. To some, the phenomenon is frightening, while others find it exhilarating.
author: Mother Angelica

quote: War kills men, and men deplore the loss; but war also crushes bad principles and tyrants, and so saves societies.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: My mom said the only reason men are alive is for lawn care and vehicle maintenance.
author: Tim Allen

quote: That was not what men and women fought for during the war.
author: Barbara Castle

quote: A strong hatred is the best lamp to bear in our hands as we go over the dark places of life, cutting away the dead things men tell us to revere.
author: Rebecca West

quote: Men, like nails, lose their usefulness when they lose their direction and begin to bend.
author: Walter Savage Landor

quote: Commitment means that it is possible for a man to yield the nerve center of his consent to a purpose or cause, a movement or an ideal, which may be more important to him than whether he lives or dies.
author: Howard Thurman

quote: The ocean moans over dead men's bones.
author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quote: This empire, unlike any other in the history of the world, has been built primarily through economic manipulation, through cheating, through fraud, through seducing people into our way of life, through the economic hit men. I was very much a part of that.
author: John Perkins

quote: If we are marked to die, we are enough to do our country loss; and if to live, the fewer men, the greater share of honor.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I look only to the good qualities of men. Not being faultless myself, I won't presume to probe into the faults of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Men are by nature merely indifferent to one another; but women are by nature enemies.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Men of genius are often dull and inert in society; as the blazing meteor, when it descends to earth, is only a stone.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Men give away nothing so liberally as their advice.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Men should be like Kleenex, soft, strong and disposable.
author: Cher

quote: Deliberation is the work of many men. Action, of one alone.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: If you ask men why they did a good job, they'll say, 'I'm awesome. Obviously. Why are you even asking?' If you ask women why they did a good job, what they'll say is someone helped them, they got lucky, they worked really hard.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: The truth is that we live out our lives putting off all that can be put off; perhaps we all know deep down that we are immortal and that sooner or later all men will do and know all things.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Whatever makes men good Christians, makes them good citizens.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: Human misery is too great for men to do without faith.
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: The difference between men and women seems to be this: I can argue with my promoter downstairs, accuse him of ripping me off, and 20 minutes later we'll be playing golf together. With a lady, the same argument can go on for, like, years.
author: David Hasselhoff

quote: Boys will be boys, and so will a lot of middle-aged men.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Every man is a volume if you know how to read him.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: You look across the board at comedy quiz shows, and they are mainly hosted by men.
author: Jo Brand

quote: First find the man in yourself if you will inspire manliness in others.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: If the world were a logical place, men would ride side saddle.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Culture makes all men gentle.
author: Menander

quote: Men who love their mothers treat women wonderfully. And they have enormous respect for women.
author: Ellen Barkin

quote: Neutral men are the devil's allies.
author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quote: The American flag is an enduring symbol of liberty, democracy, and justice. It is fitting that the House act to protect it as we approach our nation's birthday, and as our men and women in uniform rally behind it in Iraq's battlefields.
author: Joe Barton

quote: When a man is no longer anxious to do better than well, he is done for.
author: Benjamin Haydon

quote: The need for a non-veteran reserve became painfully obvious in the Korean war when many of the men who were being called to serve were World War II veterans participating in Ready Reserve units.
author: J. Anthony Lukas

quote: Whoever sets any bounds for the reconstructive power of the religious life over the social relations and institutions of men, to that extent denies the faith of the Master.
author: Walter Rauschenbusch

quote: When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I only have 'yes' men around me. Who needs 'no' men?
author: Mae West

quote: Religions, which condemn the pleasures of sense, drive men to seek the pleasures of power. Throughout history power has been the vice of the ascetic.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Certainly the best works, and of greatest merit for the public, have proceeded from the unmarried, or childless men.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: When men and women agree, it is only in their conclusions; their reasons are always different.
author: George Santayana

quote: Those men get along best with women who can get along best without them.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Treat all men alike. Give them the same law. Give them an even chance to live and grow.
author: Chief Joseph

quote: All men who have turned out worth anything have had the chief hand in their own education.
author: Walter Scott

quote: The press seemed to take some delight that I previously had a 'straight audience,' and set about trying to destroy that. And I think some men were frustrated that their girlfriends wouldn't let go of the idea that George Michael just hadn't found the 'right girl.'
author: George Michael

quote: You may be assured that we won't ever let your words die. Like the words of our Master, Jesus Christ, they will live in our minds and our hearts and in the souls of black men and white men, brown men and yellow men as long as time shall last.
author: Ralph Abernathy

quote: Most men, when they think they are thinking, are merely rearranging their prejudices.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: A bachelor is a guy who never made the same mistake once.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Men are not punished for their sins, but by them.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: The idea that a book can advise a woman how to capture a man is touchingly naive. Books advising men how to capture a woman are far less common, perhaps because few men are willing to admit to such a difficulty. For both sexes, I recommend a good novel, offering scenarios you might learn from, if only because they reflect a lot of doubt.
author: Roger Ebert

quote: Politics separate men by bringing them together only superficially. Art and culture unite us in a common anguish that is our only possible fraternity, that of our existential and metaphysical community.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: Men tend to feel threatened; women tend to feel guilty.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Men may live fools, but fools they cannot die.
author: Edward Young

quote: Men's arguments often prove nothing but their wishes.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: All men have an instinct for conflict: at least, all healthy men.
author: Hilaire Belloc

quote: The true index of a man's character is the health of his wife.
author: Cyril Connolly

quote: Whenever ideas fail, men invent words.
author: Martin H. Fischer

quote: No nice men are good at getting taxis.
author: Katharine Whitehorn

quote: I think men are afraid to be with a successful woman, because we are terribly strong, we know what we want and we are not fragile enough.
author: Shirley Bassey

quote: Men are not against you; they are merely for themselves.
author: Gene Fowler

quote: One man that has a mind and knows it can always beat ten men who haven't and don't.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Men must know their limitations.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: I only like two kinds of men, domestic and imported.
author: Mae West

quote: Women prefer to talk in twos, while men prefer to talk in threes.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: By indignities men come to dignities.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: We must have government that builds stamina into communities and men. That makes men instead of mendicants.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: Many men owe the grandeur of their lives to their tremendous difficulties.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Men often act knowingly against their interest.
author: David Hume

quote: Men do not quit playing because they grow old; they grow old because they quit playing.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Exclusively of the abstract sciences, the largest and worthiest portion of our knowledge consists of aphorisms: and the greatest and best of men is but an aphorism.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: No one doubts that innocent men, women and children have been the victims of chemical weapons attacks in Syria. And there's no doubt who is responsible for this heinous use of chemical weapons in Syria: the Syrian regime.
author: Joe Biden

quote: For tis not in mere death that men die most.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: There is always a type of man who says he loves his fellow men, and expects to make a living at it.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: Men have as exaggerated an idea of their rights as women have of their wrongs.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: Men tire themselves in pursuit of rest.
author: Laurence Sterne

quote: Men won't read any email from a woman that's over 200 words long.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: Men are like sheep, of which a flock is more easily driven than a single one.
author: Richard Whately

quote: 'Tis easy enough to be pleasant, When life flows along like a song; But the man worth while is the one who will smile when everything goes dead wrong.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: Men, as well as women, are much oftener led by their hearts than by their understandings.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: Women thrive on novelty and are easy meat for the commerce of fashion. Men prefer old pipes and torn jackets.
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: Every time a man expects, as he says, his money to work for him, he is expecting other people to work for him.
author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quote: In life we shall find many men that are great, and some that are good, but very few men that are both great and good.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: A lot of times, women don't get the male perspective in regards to a relationship, what men go through when they're not really dealing well.
author: Morris Chestnut

quote: Men do not fail; they give up trying.
author: Elihu Root

quote: Men are often biased in their judgment on account of their sympathy and their interests.
author: George William Norris

quote: Men, even when alone, lighten their labors by song, however rude it may be.
author: Quintilian

quote: He was one of those men who possess almost every gift, except the gift of the power to use them.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: As I said, men value their independence in a weird way, above practically everything.
author: George Weinberg

quote: Men are actually the weaker sex.
author: George Weinberg

quote: Men, who are rogues individually, are in the mass very honorable people.
author: Charles de Secondat

quote: Stronger by weakness, wiser men become.
author: Edmund Waller

quote: Italian men do appreciate beautiful women. They're not afraid of the beauty, which is nice.
author: Eva Herzigova

quote: Law describes the way things would work if men were angels.
author: Christopher Dawson

quote: For most men life is a search for the proper manila envelope in which to get themselves filed.
author: Clifton Fadiman

quote: Men are different. When they are in love they may also have other girlfriends.
author: Zhang Ziyi

quote: What do women do when they get together? We sit around and talk! Men, not so much. My theory is that this difference is genetic and dates back to the hunter-gatherer societies, when the men had to be quiet as they hunted, lest they scare away the bison and then everyone starved to death and it was all their fault.
author: Jenna McCarthy

quote: The beauty of a strong, lasting commitment is often best understood by men incapable of it.
author: Murray Kempton
